q: What documents are needed for car rental?
What to do in case of an accident?
a: In the event of an accident, call the number specified in the contract

q: Is it possible to deliver the car to another city?
a: Delivery of the car is possible within a radius of 20 km from the city of Nuremberg

q: Is it possible to transfer the vehicle to third parties?
a: Allowed if they are written in the contract

q: What is not included in the rental price?
a: The price does not include fuel
250 km per day, anything above costs 0.20 cents per kilometer
